Articles.Content: My bad sorry i think i made a stupid assumption so far it has been working pretty well

The servo window in flight (working in 0.35.5) is just a empty grey field in 0.24/x64.

Not tested in VAB.
so is it working on KSP 0.24/x64? I don't want to update my game until I can use all my current mods.

so is it working on KSP 0.24/x64? I don't want to update my game until I can use all my current mods.

Some are saying it works others are saying it isnt(no log file to show). I am going to update the package anyway due to TweakScale and kspapiextensions. Hopefully both have been updated and I will roll out a new one.

Pity that it is always mods that add the most functionality to the game having problems after updates, but this seems to be inevitable in such cases. The deeper the digging the bigger the Balrog.

(working in 0.35.5)

Where did you get this!?

scnr

Pity that it is always mods that add the most functionality to the game having problems after updates, but this seems to be inevitable in such cases. The deeper the digging the bigger the Balrog.

Where did you get this!?

scnr

Slingshot around Kerbol for timetravel.

Anyway, of course I meant 0.23.5.

Some are saying it works others are saying it isnt(no log file to show). I am going to update the package anyway due to TweakScale and kspapiextensions. Hopefully both have been updated and I will roll out a new one.

Sadly TweakScale is also dependent on KSPAPIExtentions, which I've not gotten to work on my computer (even the 0.24 alpha version). So for now we play the waiting game.
I might create a drifter plane with this!
Looking forward to this being updated.
Can anyone give me any idea of what isn't working with Scale & KSPAPIExtentions? I'm on DSL and my download apparently failed. :/

As I haven't been able to get the game running with KSPAPIExtensions, I don't rightly know what problems TweakScale might have. I hope a simple recompile just makes everything work, but I'm much to pessimistic to actually expect it to.

KAE gives me a silent crash on the loading screen:

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
  at UrlDir+.MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 

  at GameDatabase+.MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 

(Filename:  Line: -1)

Not exactly helpful.

As I haven't been able to get the game running with KSPAPIExtensions, I don't rightly know what problems TweakScale might have. I hope a simple recompile just makes everything work, but I'm much to pessimistic to actually expect it to.

KAE gives me a silent crash on the loading screen:

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
  at UrlDir+.MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 

  at GameDatabase+.MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 

(Filename:  Line: -1)

Not exactly helpful.

Strange. I'm waiting for my download to finished. It failed last night so it's back to round 2. 40k/s this is going to take a while...
Had a closer look, and it appears this bug is in Module Manager. So I'm off trying to make TweakScale work.
A long while later, I find that it's caused by empty cfg files, and not actually caused by module manager, KSPAPIExtensions or TweakScale. Well that's good.

A long while later, I find that it's caused by empty cfg files, and not actually caused by module manager, KSPAPIExtensions or TweakScale. Well that's good.

Up to the next round
